manifest:
builder:
  track: stable

labels:
  app-group: estafette-ci
  team: estafette-team
  language: golang

version:
  semver:
    major: 0
    minor: 0

stages:
  build:
    image: golang:1.13.6-alpine3.11
    env:
      CGO_ENABLED: 0
      GOOS: linux
    commands:
    - go test ./...

  tag-revision:
    image: golang:1.13.6-alpine3.11
    commands:
    - apk add git
    - git tag v${ESTAFETTE_BUILD_VERSION}
    - git push origin v${ESTAFETTE_BUILD_VERSION}

  slack-notify:
    image: extensions/slack-build-status:dev
    workspace: estafette
    channels:
    - '#build-status'
    when:
      status == 'succeeded' ||
      status == 'failed'
manifestWithDefaults:
builder:
  track: stable
  os: linux
labels:
  app-group: estafette-ci
  language: golang
  team: estafette-team
version:
  semver:
    major: 0
    minor: 0
    patch: '{{auto}}'
    labelTemplate: '{{branch}}'
    releaseBranch: master
stages:
  build:
    image: golang:1.13.6-alpine3.11
    shell: /bin/sh
    workDir: /estafette-work
    commands:
    - go test ./...
    when: status == 'succeeded'
    env:
      CGO_ENABLED: "0"
      GOOS: linux
  tag-revision:
    image: golang:1.13.6-alpine3.11
    shell: /bin/sh
    workDir: /estafette-work
    commands:
    - apk add git
    - git tag v${ESTAFETTE_BUILD_VERSION}
    - git push origin v${ESTAFETTE_BUILD_VERSION}
    when: status == 'succeeded'
  slack-notify:
    image: extensions/slack-build-status:dev
    shell: /bin/sh
    workDir: /estafette-work
    when: status == 'succeeded' || status == 'failed'
    channels:
    - '#build-status'
    workspace: estafette

commits.message: add pipeline whitelist in secret envelope and use when decrypting to see if pipeline is allowed to use the secret
